io.gumga.core.service

Interface GumgaTemplateEngineService<INPUT,OUTPUT_WRITER,OUTPUT>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GumgaAbstractTemplateEngineAdapter

    public interface GumgaTemplateEngineService<INPUT,OUTPUT_WRITER,OUTPUT>
    Interface describing a template engine service. It contains the basic methods to merge a template with the given data.
    Since:
    jul/2015
    Author:
    gyowannyqueiroz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      Init method that must be called by default after instantiating the concrete implementations.
      OUTPUT parse(INPUT values, String template)
      Merges the given values to the given template and returns the result of the type specified by the OUTPUT.
      void parse(INPUT values, String template, OUTPUT_WRITER out)
      Merges the given values to the given template and save the result in the specified writer.
      void setDefaultEncoding(String encoding)
      Sets the parser engine's default encoding
      void setTemplateFolder(String folder)
      Sets the folder where the templates are stored

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
   throws TemplateEngineException
        Init method that must be called by default after instantiating the concrete implementations. Useful to place the template engine configuration.
        Throws:
        TemplateEngineException - Exception thrown when something goes wrong while initializing the implementation

      • setTemplateFolder

        void setTemplateFolder(String folder)
        Sets the folder where the templates are stored
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder where the templates are located

      • setDefaultEncoding

        void setDefaultEncoding(String encoding)
        Sets the parser engine's default encoding
        Parameters:
        encoding - The encoding of the templates like UTF-8 and etc.

      • parse

        void parse(INPUT values,
           String template,
           OUTPUT_WRITER out)
    throws TemplateEngineException
        Merges the given values to the given template and save the result in the specified writer.
        Parameters:
        values - The values to be merged with the template
        template - The template to be parsed
        out - The object responsible to save the output file. It may be an OutputStream for example.
        Throws:
        TemplateEngineException - When something goes wrong while parsing the template

      • parse

        OUTPUT parse(INPUT values,
             String template)
      throws TemplateEngineException
        Merges the given values to the given template and returns the result of the type specified by the OUTPUT.
        Parameters:
        values - The values to be merged with the template
        template - The template to be parsed
        Returns:
        The result specified by the OUTPUT generic type
        Throws:
        TemplateEngineException - When something goes wrong while parsing the template
